description: Government funding will be "inevitable" to secure air routes, a passenger watchdog says.
title: Passenger watchdog calls for Isle of Man government-run airline
title_page: Passenger watchdog calls for Isle of Man government-run airline - BBC News
maintext: "Surely this would be far better spent on setting up our own airline, able to make its own decisions and able to fly alongside the 'no frills low cost' services we currently enjoy... in a controlled and co-operative way."
